title: Kiss And Chase
alternative_title: Kiss and Chase; 키스 앤 체이스
status: Kiss and Chase; 키스 앤 체이스
description:
Description :
        Kiss and Chase,   at manhwawebsite"If you're caught, I'll make sure you can't rest easy."Lucas Blake, a royal alpha with stunning looks, suffered from severe OCD and misanthropy. For me, an ordinary beta, this one-sided love was nothing short of a tragedy.One day, I was suddenly overwhelmed by Lucas's pheromones when he went into heat and found myself in his arms by accident."I I've been waiting for you."Unfortunately or fortunately, he couldn't remember that night."So you're saying that you, uh, had something happen with an omega and you don't remember at all?""Judging from the circumstances, I think I was drugged and did something with an omega, Yuna."A mix of relief and disappointment washed over me, then his eyes gleamed ominously."I'll make that omega pay."Unable to give up on him yet, I made an irreversible choice.When will this one-sided love, which I can't let go of even in this situation, finally end?Maybe you like !
